statement.title: # Content
# Standard Input
statement.content:
最多100组case

每组给出两行字符串s, t，1 <= |s|, |t| <= 110，|s| = |t|，s, t 都只含有 {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}.

statement.title: # Standard Output
statement.content: 对于每组数据，输出一行答案，表示最少步数，使得 t 变为 s

statement.title: # Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
22345611 12345611 2234562221 1234561221 2234562211 1234561111 22345622112 12345611111 654321654321654321654321 1234561234561234561234561 2 3 3 11
